category.name: Configuration.Data Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AE_default_dataset_type
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of preferred dataset types per file extensions. These dataset types will be listed first before any other matching dataset types, when retrieving them by file extension. Note that currently this preference is not used in Rich Application Client(RAC). Valid values have the following pattern: "file_extension:dataset_type" (e.g. "doc:MSWORD").
